node.text:
A traditional welcome, unparalleled views, sumptuous cuisine, city tours and a host of hotel privileges. The Sights & Culture Package at The Raviz Kovalam will no doubt prove to be a one of a kind beach vacation!

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
